reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and comfortable to wear, with one mentioning it's perfect for a rehearsal dinner.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: The material is very nice it was super comfortable to wear. I did have a small problem with the straps being a bit loose but it was an easy fix Read more
items.author: Ana Maria Sanchez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress. Worth the price?
items.body: It came very wrinkly and kind of a weird smell. I wore it with no bra and it’s not that see-through, which is good. The material is kind of thin though, and I don’t know if it’s really worth that price. Read more
items.author: Mya Gabrielle garrison

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars White dress
items.body: Not true to color, fits awkwardly by the chest and neck and the quality of the material is not the greatest Read more
items.author: Hannah M

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars I don’t think sizing up would even work
items.body: I wanted to love this dress soooo badly. My fiance and I want to do a court house wedding and then surprise everyone at the actual wedding with us having already been married for a year so I’ve been trying to find a dress that would fit me that’s relatively cheap for just a court house. And I absolutely love this style, unfortunately it’s not my style. I don’t really recommend any bigger women buying this. I’m normally an XL, and definitely overweight (which I’m trying to fix trust me). But this dress has absolutely no give and it’s definitely not meant for any bigger chested women. (I’m a 38D) There’s absolutely no give in the waist part (the part that makes the V) or the breast area so you’re spilling out either the front or out the back and it just doesn’t look right. It’s almost like the straps are longer than the photos too. I added photos of me in it but I don’t think you can see truly what I mean by all of it. I would proceed with caution if you do end up buying this and aren’t the models size. I wanted to love it so so badly. It’s just unfortunate that my body won’t work with it. :/ Read more
items.author: Jayme McKinnon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy dress
items.body: The perfect dress. Fits great. Looks very classy! Read more
items.author: Campgirl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress, but some issues.
items.body: I used this dress for my engagement photos. My only issue with this dress is that the top has absolutely NO SUPPORT. If you’re bigger chested, or breastfeeding, I wouldn’t recommend this dress unless you want to fiddle with it. The fabric has close to no stretch to it, but the quality of the fabric was decent. About what you would expect from an Amazon dress. Sizing was pretty TTS. Read more
items.author: Amanda Bender

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Romantic, flowy dress with cinched bodice
items.body: Let me just get this one little thing off my chest: I ordered the PINK floral and I received the BLUE floral. :( Tragic, as I actually needed a pink dress for an upcoming event and I was hoping this thing would be The One. So, after a few moments of sadness mourning the loss of the pink dress I'd envisioned receiving, I decided to give ole blue a try. The fit, I must say, feels as though it was custom-made for my frame. That's a huge yay for me as I'm petite (5') and typically unless the dress is a petite version, the bodice on styles like this one are often too long. I'm pleasantly shocked to report that this bodice fit me like a glove (I ordered the XS). And the overall aesthetic is definitely giving Disney Princess vibes. The length is closer to midi than maxi (again, given my height I expected it to be longer on me than shown in the photos). The cut out design of the back is my favorite element of this dress, since it's a more unusual style and it's particularly eye-catching if you wear your hair up, or if you have short hair. If you're a Petal & Pup or Altar'd State fan, this style is for you. The square neckline is also quite flattering. The front slit isn't noticeable unless you're walking with Paul Bunyan strides, but it's a classic style addition. I do wish the ties weren't so long though. In order to alleviate them hanging way down in the back, the only option is to tie a gigantic bow. I'm not a fan of gigantic bows in general, and coupled with the slightly busy pattern of the dress, the bow just feels as though it's trying to compete with the gorgeous back design of the dress. And the bodice fits me so well, I really don't need the tie to cinch anything in. Believe me, it's cinched enough already! Read more
items.author: Rebecca McDonnell

short_description:
Womens Dress Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Floral, White, Yellow Floral, Blue Floral, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
